cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description1: Cookies are small files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.
cookies.description2: We use cookies to make [service name] work and collect information about how you use our service.
cookies.essential.title: Essential cookies
cookies.essential.description: Essential cookies keep your information secure while you use [service name]. We do not need to ask permission to use them.
